summary: An Ordinance specifying and adopting the system or plan proposed providing certain additions to the existing Water Supply System of The City of Seattle, declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be, submitting said system or plan, and the proposition and authority to become indebted for the construction of said system or plan, to the qualified voters of The City of Seattle for ratification or rejection at the general election to be held March 3rd, A. D., 1908.
